title: Apple's podcast play, Netflix's rough quarter, and a listener mail on crypto's carbon footprint
description:
Kara and Scott talk about Apple's big announcements in the podcast space and what that means for other competitors in the podcast market. They also discuss Netflix's falling subscriptions and take a look back at their first quarter last year. In listener mail we get a question about cryptocurrency's carbon footprint. And Scott has predictions for Quibi content.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
